objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Horror themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Horror narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Horror lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a frightening or supernatural situation involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a horror context
Students engage in horror themed role-play about technology in daily life using slang register
Students create original horror themed content about technology in daily life in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Horror scenario?
What terror or darkness might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Horror story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Horror perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this horror scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Horror situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using slang register in horror context
Character B: Responding in slang register within horror theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with terror
technology in daily life with darkness
technology in daily life with mysterious

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Horror theme: Fear, suspense, supernatural elements

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Horror themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
